channel.title: Syrup on Tiny Tavern
channel.description: Recent content in Syrup on Tiny Tavern

item.title: Classic French Toast Platter
item.description: 2 slices of toast dusted with powdered sugar, served with syrup and scrambled eggs.

item.title: Pancake/Waffle Platter
item.description: (Served with jam, compote, or whipped cream) 3 pancakes or waffles of your choice, 2 scrambled eggs, 2 crispy turkey bacon or saut√©ed sausages, and 2 slices of toast.

item.title: Regular Waffles
item.description: A stack of fluffy, classic waffles dusted with powdered sugar and topped with whipped cream and strawberry/blueberry compote.
